body: Crane style focuses on defense and agile counterattacks. Practitioners are known for graceful, one-legged stances and folding arm techniques that mimic a crane's enormous wings.Feat Path: Crane Style, Crane Wing, Crane Riposte.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Feats/Types of Feats/Style Feats/Crane Style
name: Crane Style
